mapper.sql: id, orderId, hsId, bailDate, bailAmount, bailType, bailAmount, tsc, tsu
mapper.select: SELECT id, orderId, hsId, bailDate, bailAmount, bailType, tsc, tsu FROM hs_ying_bail WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND deleted = 0

select id, orderId, hsId, bailDate, bailAmount, bailType, tsc, tsu FROM hs_ying_bail
and deleted = 0 and orderId = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and fyDate = #{fyDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and hsId = #{hsId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT
FROM hs_ying_bail WHERE orderId = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND deleted = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE hs_ying_bail SET deleted = 1, tsu = current_timestamp WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT} and deleted=0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hs_ying_bail ( id, orderId, hsId, bailDate, bailAmount, bailType ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{hsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bailDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{bailAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bailType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into hs_ying_bail
id, orderId, hsId, bailDate, bailAmount, bailType,

mapper.update: UPDATE hs_ying_bail SET orderId = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, hsId = #{hsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, bailDate = #{bailDate,jdbcType=DATE}, bailAmount = #{bailAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bailType = #{bailType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tsc = #{tsc,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tsu = current_timestamp WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
